name: Whiskara
storyline:
Lyra awakens to a bewildering discovery: her father’s legendary sword lies on her table. Confused and worried, she rushes to ask her father what it means, only to discover that he’s been attacked by one of Hypnos’ sinister owl-bots. With her father too weak to fight for the valley, Lyra learns that she must step up as the new Defender of Wydran.

With her father’s fate hanging in the balance, Lyra seeks the help of the village doctor, who reveals the terrifying truth: Hypnos, the ancient being of mind control, is spreading his power and threatening to enslave the minds of all. It’s up to Lyra to stop him before he plunges the world into chaos!
summary: Whiskara is an action role-playing game where you play as a cat named Lyra. Whiskara also features choice-driven storytelling
